yaqj~jAya# caiqva yaja#mAnAya cAq &&SiShaqmA SA$staq upa#hUtEq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI ityA#haq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI EqvOpa# hvayatE pUrvaqjE RuqtAva#rIq ityA#ha pUrvaqjE hyE#tE RuqtAva#rI dEqvI dEqvapu#trEq ityA#ha dEqvI hyE#tE dEqvapu#trEq upa#hUtOq&yaM 
~Myaja#mAnaq ityA#haq yaja#mAnamEqvOpa# hvayataq utta#rasyAM dEvayaqjyAyAqmupa#hUtOq BUya#si haviqShkara#Naq upa#hUtO diqvyE dhAmaqnnupa#hUtaq - [  ]  40
